Articles - Chiang Mai

Discovering the Temples of Chiang Mai

Chiang Mai is famous for its beautiful temples. From the famous Doi Suthep to the lesser-known Wat Phra That Doi Kham, there is no shortage of stunning religious sites to explore in this city. If you're planning a trip to Chiang Mai, make sure to add some temple visits to your itinerary!

Exploring Chiang Mai's Night Markets

One of the highlights of any visit to Chiang Mai is the night markets. These vibrant markets are full of stalls selling everything from street food to handmade crafts. Make sure to try some local delicacies like khao soi and mango sticky rice while you're there!
